scenario_text.value:
Takuma, there! That’s it! That’s the weird
thing!
Huh?! UWAAAH! A hew-mun?

A creature? Here? Chase it away before it can
hurt anyone!

(But it doesn’t seem very threatening.
Maybe it can talk?)

(If we know what it wants we might be able to
work together.)
(What should I do?)
Try talking to it.
Chase it away.
Give it some nuts.
Try talking to it.

Hello? Are you all alone?
Why are you out here?
I’ve got nothing at all to say to you...
Takuma, look! There’s something on its mouth!
Is that...a piece of a nut?
Don’t you look at me!
It ran off...

I wonder if it stole some of the nuts we were
saving...
It must have been hungry.
Chase it away.

(It doesn’t seem threatening, but that could
all be an act.)

It’s gotta be dangerous.
Agumon, let’s chase it away!
Right!
Argh!
It ran off before we could fight...
Hang on. It might not have been an enemy...
Give it some nuts.
If you won’t fight us, we won’t fight you.

Do you mean that?
If so, I need to ask you something.
Do you have any food you could share?

No matter what I do, I can’t find any more
food and my hunger is too much to bear...
Food? Do you want some nuts?
Really? Thank you!
It ate them all!
*munch* *munch* *munch*
*om* *nom* *nom* Yum, yum!
Oh, uh, sorry... That really helped.

I would want to thank you properly but sadly,
I’ve nothing fit for a hew-mun.....
Then why don’t you join us?
Join you?

We need a lot of allies today.
If we feed you, will you help us?

Well, then... I see. I am in your debt, so
I should indeed help you.

My name is Tailmon.
Pleased to make your acquaintance.
Huh?! UWAAAH! A, a human?!
I d-don’t got nothing to say to you!
Aw jeez, don’t look at me!
Rrrgh...!

Do you mean that? Then, I need to ask you
something.
...Got any food to spare?

I couldn’t find a morsel to eat. I’m awful
hungry...
Really? Thank you!
*munch* *munch* *munch*
*om* *nom* *nom* Yum, yum!
Oh, uh, sorry... That really hit the spot.

I wanna saw thanks, but I don’t got anything
fit for a human...
Join you?

Is that right? Okay, then... I gotta pay you
back, so I’ll lend you a hand!
I’m Palmon! Nice to meet you!
